thread.title: Paris stay
thread.title_full: Paris stay - Review of Hotel Le A, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pam C
title: Paris stay
text:
Lovely boutique hotel. Room much bigger than I thought it would be. Great breakfast in the am and nice sitting room to relax. Only downside was noise at night of cars, motorcycles and honking due to night club down the street. Since we were there only one night it wasn't a problem again. Otherwise a great place to stay and staff was very friendly and helpful. Within walking distance to Champs Elysees.
Room Tip: Ask for a room not on the main street to avoid noise from night club. We were there on a weekend nig... See more room tips
